about_the_game:
The Dangerous Back-to-School Season
In this RPG, you’ll guide the protagonist, who has just received a university acceptance letter, through a series of cybersecurity challenges. On their journey to enroll, they’ll face threats like phishing attacks, ransomware, password breaches, and cyberbullying. By making the right dialogue choices and completing various mini-games, you will help the protagonist recognize and overcome these threats, ensuring a safe and successful university enrollment.

Key Features:

Pixel art style inspired by the real world
Unique focus on cybersecurity
Multiple outcomes unlocked through dialogue and choices
Levels themed around common cybersecurity threats, including phishing, ransomware, password attacks, and cyberbullying
Mini-games blending puzzle-solving and strategy
This game is perfect for teens and adults interested in cybersecurity and is a great way to raise awareness about online threats.

name: The Dangerous Back-to-School Season

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: The Dangerous Back-to-School Season is a pixel RPG where players guide the protagonist through cybersecurity threats . Using dialogue choices and mini-games, players must help the protagonist make the right decisions to ensure a safe enrollment.
